subject: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Dear Beneficiary.
We received a memo from the relevant authority in IMF directing that
we  should calculate all accumulated interest from your outstanding
inheritance fund of US$25million
and effect payment to you without delay through our affiliate
bank,Commonwealth Bank Australia.
In view of this ,we have made the calculation and the accrued interest
from your fund stands at USD2,750. only.
We have worked out three modes of payment with regard to this accrued
interest payment.
Thus,we have  (1) Payment by Cashiers Check (2) Payment by ATM  Debit
card and (3) Payment by Bitcoin.
You are advised to chose any option of payment through which you want
to receive this accrued interest and get back to us as soon as
possible.
While replying,please include your address,your phone number and copy
of your valid ID.
Your urgent response will be appreciated. Please reply to :
baronwilliams.equity@gmail.com
.
Contact person: Baron Williams. Phone:+1716 562 6397.
Thank you
Mr. Max Fletcher.
Operations Department (UNFCC)
Officer In-Charge

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Dear Mr. Max Fletcher,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I would like to proceed with the payment by ATM Debit card. 

Please find attached a copy of my valid ID and my phone number is +1-234-567-890.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Denise
